MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL13 & LL14  postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in Wynnstay Hall Estate, Pen Y Lan, Overton Road and surrounding areas.  Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of broken equipment on the overhead network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:29pm on 23rd March 2021
